Description:
this is the first map black ops 3 custom zombie to feature wall running.  this is my first map for black ops 3 custom zombie.

Im working on a new Map ATM code name School. Want to see me making the Map Check my twtich stream twitch.tv/nathan3197 aswell the Stick Army Discord for Screenshots

Title: Coop one window challenge V1.1
